sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.wfCFITrating</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>wfCFITrating</name>
        <script><![CDATA[function cfitRating(instance) {
    gs.log('For CFIT');
    var value = new GlideAggregate('asmt_metric_result');
    value.addEncodedQuery('metric.metric_type.evaluation_method=assessment^instance=' + instance);
    value.addAggregate('SUM', 'actual_value');
    value.query();
    while (value.next()) {
        var totalvalue = value.getAggregate('SUM', 'actual_value');
        var demand = value.source_id;
        this.setImpact(totalvalue, demand);

    }
}

function setImpact(totalvalue, demand) {
    var getDemand = new GlideRecord('dmn_demand');
    getDemand.get(demand);
    if (totalvalue < 72)
        getDemand.setValue('impact', '3');
    else if ((totalvalue > 72) && (totalvalue < 105))
        getDemand.setValue('impact', '2');
    else if (totalvalue > 104)
        getDemand.setValue('impact', '1');
    getDemand.update();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>K095239</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-10-03 12:17:39</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>aee5aa17db257514402242b813961968</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>wfCFITrating</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_aee5aa17db257514402242b813961968</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:26:36</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
